refsect1.programlisting:
<CsoundSynthesizer> <CsOptions> ; Select audio/midi flags here according to platform ; Audio out Audio in No messages -odac -iadc -d ;;;RT audio I/O ; For Non-realtime ouput leave only the line below: ; -o pareq.wav -W ;;; for file output any platform </CsOptions> <CsInstruments>
sr = 44100 kr = 4410 ksmps = 10 nchnls = 2
instr 15 ifc = p4 ; Center / Shelf kq = p5 ; Quality factor sqrt(.5) is no resonance kv = ampdb(p6) ; Volume Boost/Cut imode = p7 ; Mode 0=Peaking EQ, 1=Low Shelf, 2=High Shelf kfc linseg ifc*2, p3, ifc/2 asig rand 5000 ; Random number source for testing aout pareq asig, kfc, kv, kq, imode ; Parmetric equalization outs aout, aout ; Output the results endin
</CsInstruments> <CsScore>
; SCORE: ; Sta Dur Fcenter Q Boost/Cut(dB) Mode i15 0 1 10000 .2 12 1 i15 + . 5000 .2 12 1 i15 . . 1000 .707 -12 2 i15 . . 5000 .1 -12 0 e
</CsScore> </CsoundSynthesizer>
